Desc.entry: Group of local people and organisations who work together to try and maintain and improve their local community. Offers a variety of adult learning courses, holiday sports activities for children, volunteer-led environment projects, a quarterly newsletter and free information updates/mailings. A registered charity.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (office times); 2nd Mon in the month at 7pm (meeting)

category.entry: COMMUNITY FORUMS AND LOCAL ACTION GROUPS
